name: AI generated youtube video, using chatgpt, dall e, whisper

__IMTCONN__.label: My Airtable OAuth connection (User ID: usrvFmrZeXtlaO9GA)

mapper.input:
Generate a YouTube Shorts script (30–45 seconds long) based on the title: "{{5.`Video title`}}".

Requirements:
- Break the script into exactly 10 scenes.
- Each scene must include:
   - "scene": scene number (1–10)
   - "narration": 1–2 short, punchy sentences for the voiceover
   - "visual": a vivid description of the image that matches the narration
   - "duration": length of this scene in seconds (between 3–5 seconds, total must add up to 30–45 seconds)
- At the root level of the JSON, also include:
   - "totalDuration": total sum of all durations in seconds
   - "fullNarration": all 10 narrations combined in order, separated by spaces (this will be used for one TTS audio track)
- Keep the narration conversational and engaging for YouTube Shorts.
- Do not include any extra text, commentary, or explanation.
- Output strictly in valid JSON format like this:

{
  "totalDuration": 38,
  "fullNarration": "First narration sentence. Second narration sentence. ...",
  "data": [
    {
      "scene": 1,
      "narration": "First narration sentence here.",
      "visual": "Description of the first image here.",
      "duration": 4
    },
    {
      "scene": 2,
      "narration": "Second narration sentence here.",
      "visual": "Description of the second image here.",
      "duration": 3
    }
  ]
}
